# unlockFocus()

**Instance Method**

Removes the focus from the image.

## Declaration

```swift
func unlockFocus()
```

## Discussion

This message must be sent after a successful [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSImage/lockFocus()] or [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSImage/lockFocusOnRepresentation:] message and the completion of any intermediate drawing commands. This method restores the focus to the previous owner, if any.

Do not send this message if the preceding call to lock focus raised an `NSImageCacheException`.

## Instance Methods

- **lockFocus()**: Prepares the image to receive drawing commands.
- **lockFocusFlipped(_:)**: Prepares the image to receive drawing commands using the specified flipped state.
- **init(iconRef:)**: Initializes the image object with a Carbon-style icon resource.
